Package icyllis.arc3d.opengl

package icyllis.arc3d.opengl
OpenGL.
  • Classes

    Description
    GLAttachment
    Renderbuffer can be only used as attachments of framebuffers as an optimization.

    Stores some capabilities of a OpenGL context.

    The main command buffer of OpenGL context.
    GLCore
    Provides native interfaces of OpenGL 4.5 core and user-defined utilities.

    The OpenGL device.
    GLFramebufferInfo
    Types for interacting with GL resources created externally to pipeline.

    This class manages a GPU program and records per-program information.

    Provides OpenGL objects with cache.

    Represents OpenGL sampler objects.

    Represents OpenGL 2D textures.

    GLUniformDataManager
    Uploads a UBO for a Uniform Interface Block with std140 layout.
    GLUniformHandler
    Builds a Uniform Block with std140 layout.
    GLVertexArray
    This class manages the lifetime of the vertex array object and is used to track the state of the vertex array to avoid redundant GL calls.
